item.title: Tmux Cheatsheet
item.description: Table of Contents Table of Contents Introduction Cheat sheet Sessions Windows Panes Misc Introduction tmux is very useful when you have a remote session on a server via ssh, and you need to open multiple consoles, this avoid to open multiple ssh sessions to the server. Also it is very useful when you are working in pairs with a mate remotely, allowing both to share the same interactive session. I have used tmux from time to time, and I always forgot all the commands required to create new windows, panes, split current pane, rename window and so on.
